original_text: He can deal gently with the ignorant and wayward, since he himself is beset with weakness.
korean_text: 그가 무식하고 미혹된 자를 능히 용납할 수 있는 것은 자기도 연약에 휩싸여 있음이라

sentences.original_text: He can deal gently with the ignorant and wayward
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 무지하고 길을 잃은 자들에게 부드럽게 대해할 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: since he himself is beset with weakness.
